hera.keystore

Interface KeyStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractKeyStore, InMemoryKeyStore, JavaKeyStore

    @ApiAudience.Public
 @ApiStability.Unstable
public interface KeyStore

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EncryptedPrivateKey export(Authentication authentication)
      Export an private key encrypted.
      java.util.List<Identity> listIdentities()
      Get all the stored identities.

      Lock an account corresponding to authentication.

    • Method Detail

      • unlock

        AccountAddress unlock(Authentication authentication)
        Unlock an account corresponding to authentication.
        Parameters:
        authentication - an authentication to unlock account
        Returns:
        an unlocked account
        Throws:
        KeyStoreException - on keystore error

      • lock

        boolean lock(Authentication authentication)
        Lock an account corresponding to authentication.
        Parameters:
        authentication - an authentication which is used in locking account
        Returns:
        a lock result

      • save

        void save(Authentication authentication,
          AergoKey key)
        Store an AergoKey to the keystore.
        Parameters:
        authentication - an authentication to save key
        key - an aergo key to store
        Throws:
        KeyStoreException - on keystore error

      • export

        EncryptedPrivateKey export(Authentication authentication)
        Export an private key encrypted.
        Parameters:
        authentication - an authentication to used in exporting key
        Returns:
        an encrypted private key.
        Throws:
        KeyStoreException - on keystore error

      • listIdentities

        java.util.List<Identity> listIdentities()
        Get all the stored identities.
        Returns:
        stored identities.
        Throws:
        KeyStoreException - on keystore error

      • store

        void store(java.lang.String path,
           char[] password)
        Store keystore to the path with password.
        Parameters:
        path - a path to store keystore
        password - a password to encrypt keystore

      • sign

        Transaction sign(AccountAddress unlocked,
                 RawTransaction rawTransaction)
        Sign to raw transaction.
        Parameters:
        unlocked - an account to sign
        rawTransaction - raw transaction to sign
        Returns:
        a signed transaction
        Throws:
        KeyStoreException - on signing error
